entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 5 May 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
